keyword: how many calories in babybel cheese
title: How Many Calories in Babybel Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Babybel cheese per piece, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories in Babybel Cheese?
assumptions: One original Babybel cheese wheel (20g semi-soft pasteurized cheese), no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Babybel cheese piece has ~70 kcal and ~5 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Babybel cheese?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for one original 20g piece.

faqs.q: Is Babybel cheese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one piece provides ~5 g protein.
No carbs or sugars in the original variety.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Babybel cheese?
faqs.a: 6 g total fat per piece, including 4 g saturated.
Yes, Babybel Light has ~50 kcal per piece.
